languages.text: "Вы — лицо знатное, можете вмешаться. Потолковать с Капелланом — он у Денза за душеприказчика, — поинтересоваться завещанием. Или, может, отыскать Фиделио, и тоже потолковать? Ну зачем человеку такие проблемы, как нечестно полученное наследство? И уж поверьте — в случае чего старина Дэгген вам будет полезен. Я много чего знаю про Футфол и не только, могу помочь с информацией, могу подогнать надежных ребят для дела... Вам пригодится такой человек, как я!"

traits.locale_text: "Вы — лицо знатное, можете вмешаться. Потолковать с Капелланом — он у Денза за душеприказчика, — поинтересоваться завещанием. Или, может, отыскать Фиделио, и тоже потолковать? Ну зачем человеку такие проблемы, как нечестно полученное наследство? И уж поверьте — в случае чего старина Дэгген вам будет полезен. Я много чего знаю про Футфол и не только, могу помочь с информацией, могу подогнать надежных ребят для дела... Вам пригодится такой человек, как я!"

languages.text: "You're a distinguished sort, you can muscle in on this. You can talk to Chaplain — he's Denz's executor — and ask about the will. Or maybe you can find Fidelio and have a talk with them too? I mean, who'd want an inheritance that's not rightfully theirs? More trouble than it's worth, if you ask me. And trust me, old Daggen can be of service to you if you need anything. I know lots about Footfall and other things, I can help with information, get you some solid lads for a job... You can use a guy like me!"

Или, может, отыскать Фиделио, и тоже потолковать? Ну зачем человеку такие проблемы, как нечестно полученное наследство? И уж поверьте — в случае чего старина Дэгген вам будет полезен. Я много чего знаю про Футфол и не только, могу помочь с информацией, могу подогнать надежных ребят для дела... Вам пригодится такой человек, как я!"

traits.locale_text: "You're a distinguished sort, you can muscle in on this. You can talk to Chaplain — he's Denz's executor — and ask about the will. Or maybe you can find Fidelio and have a talk with them too? Think about it, why would anyone want trouble like ill-gotten inheritance? And trust me, old Daggen can be of service to you if you need anything. I know lots about Footfall and other things, I can help with information, get you some solid lads for a job... You can use a guy like me!"

languages.text: “你看起来是个尊贵的人，你可以插手这件事情。你可以去和牧师谈谈，问问他遗嘱的情况，他是丹兹的遗嘱执行人。或者，你也可以去找菲迪奥，和那个人谈谈？我在想，怎么会有人打算得到根本不属于自己的遗产呢？要我说，这么做带来的麻烦，远比得到的财富要多得多。说真的，不管你想干什么，老达根都可以帮你的忙。我很了解落脚港，也了解很多别的事情。我可以给你提供情报，替你找可靠的小伙子来干活……你肯定能用得到像我这样的人！”
languages.original_text: "You're a distinguished sort, you can muscle in on this. You can talk to Chaplain — he's Denz's executor — and ask about the will. Or maybe you can find Fidelio and have a talk with them too? I mean, who'd want an inheritance that's not rightfully theirs? More trouble than it's worth, if you ask me. And trust me, old Daggen can be of service to you if you need anything. I know lots about Footfall and other things, I can help with information, get you some solid lads for a job... You can use a guy like me!"

traits.locale_text: “你看起来是个尊贵的人，你可以插手这件事情。你可以去和牧师谈谈，问问他遗嘱的情况，他是丹兹的遗嘱执行人。或者，你也可以去找菲迪奥，和那个人谈谈？我在想，怎么会有人打算得到根本不属于自己的遗产呢？要我说，这么做带来的麻烦，远比得到的财富要多得多。说真的，不管你想干什么，老达根都可以帮你的忙。我很了解落脚港，也了解很多别的事情。我可以给你提供情报，替你找可靠的小伙子来干活……你肯定能用得到像我这样的人！”

languages.text: «Usted es una persona distinguida, así que puede meterse en esto. Hable con Capellán, el ejecutor de Denz, y pregúntele por el testamento. O encuentre a Fidelio, si es capaz, y explíqueselo. A ver, ¿quién querría una herencia que no le pertenece realmente? Va a darle más problemas que alegrías, yo creo. Y créame, el viejo Daggen puede echarle una mano con lo que sea que necesite. Sé muchas cosas, y no solo sobre Paso. Puedo conseguirle información, unos muchachos de fiar para cualquier trabajo... ¡le vendrá bien!».
languages.original_text: "You're a distinguished sort, you can muscle in on this. You can talk to Chaplain — he's Denz's executor — and ask about the will. Or maybe you can find Fidelio and have a talk with them too? I mean, who'd want an inheritance that's not rightfully theirs? More trouble than it's worth, if you ask me. And trust me, old Daggen can be of service to you if you need anything. I know lots about Footfall and other things, I can help with information, get you some solid lads for a job... You can use a guy like me!"

O encuentre a Fidelio, si es capaz, y explíqueselo. A ver, ¿quién querría una herencia que no le pertenece realmente? Va a darle más problemas que alegrías, yo creo. Y créame, el viejo Daggen puede echarle una mano con lo que sea que necesite. Sé muchas cosas, y no solo sobre Paso. Puedo conseguirle información, unos muchachos de fiar para cualquier trabajo... ¡le vendrá bien!».

languages.text: 「あんたは優秀な人物だからこの件に介入することができる。教戒官と話すんだ。奴はデンツの遺言執行者だから、あいつの遺言のことを聞いてみるといい。それか、フィデリオを探し出して直接話すこともできるかもな。自分のものじゃない遺産なんか誰もいらねえだろ？考えただけで面倒くせえ。それに、この老いぼれのダゲンも何かあれば手を貸すよ。俺はフットフォールや諸々のことをよく知っているし、情報収集も手伝えるし、仕事をこなすために若い衆を確保することだってできる…俺みたいな奴がいたら便利だぞ！」
languages.original_text: "You're a distinguished sort, you can muscle in on this. You can talk to Chaplain — he's Denz's executor — and ask about the will. Or maybe you can find Fidelio and have a talk with them too? I mean, who'd want an inheritance that's not rightfully theirs? More trouble than it's worth, if you ask me. And trust me, old Daggen can be of service to you if you need anything. I know lots about Footfall and other things, I can help with information, get you some solid lads for a job... You can use a guy like me!"

traits.locale_text: 「あんたは優秀な人物だからこの件に介入することができる。教戒官と話すんだ。奴はデンツの遺言執行者だから、あいつの遺言のことを聞いてみるといい。それか、フィデリオを探し出して直接話すこともできるかもな。自分のものじゃない遺産なんか誰もいらねえだろ？考えただけで面倒くせえ。それに、この老いぼれのダゲンも何かあれば手を貸すよ。俺はフットフォールや諸々のことをよく知っているし、情報収集も手伝えるし、仕事をこなすために若い衆を確保することだってできる…俺みたいな奴がいたら便利だぞ！」

languages.text: "Ihr seid eine angesehene Person und könntet Euch einmischen. Ihr könntet mit Ordenspriester sprechen – er ist Denz' Nachlassverwalter – und nach dem Testament fragen. Oder vielleicht findet Ihr Fidelio und könnt ein entsprechendes Gespräch führen? Ich meine, wer will denn schon eine Erbschaft, die einem rechtmäßig nicht wirklich zusteht? Das bringt mehr Ärger, als es wert ist, wenn Ihr mich fragt. Und glaubt mir, der alte Daggen kann Euch von Nutzen sein, wenn Ihr etwas braucht. Ich weiß viel über Footfall und andere Dinge, ich kann Informationen beschaffen oder Männer für einen Job ... Ihr könnt jemanden wie mich gebrauchen!"
languages.original_text: "You're a distinguished sort, you can muscle in on this. You can talk to Chaplain — he's Denz's executor — and ask about the will. Or maybe you can find Fidelio and have a talk with them too? I mean, who'd want an inheritance that's not rightfully theirs? More trouble than it's worth, if you ask me. And trust me, old Daggen can be of service to you if you need anything. I know lots about Footfall and other things, I can help with information, get you some solid lads for a job... You can use a guy like me!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid eine angesehene Person und könntet Euch einmischen. Ihr könntet mit Ordenspriester sprechen – er ist Denz' Nachlassverwalter – und nach dem Testament fragen. Oder vielleicht findet Ihr Fidelio und könnt ein entsprechendes Gespräch führen? Ich meine, wer will denn schon eine Erbschaft, die einem rechtmäßig nicht wirklich zusteht? Das bringt mehr Ärger, als es wert ist, wenn Ihr mich fragt. Und glaubt mir, der alte Daggen kann Euch von Nutzen sein, wenn Ihr etwas braucht. Ich weiß viel über Footfall und andere Dinge, ich kann Informationen beschaffen oder Männer für einen Job ... Ihr könnt jemanden wie mich gebrauchen!"

languages.text: « Vous êtes du genre distingué, alors vous pouvez sûrement mettre votre grain de sel. Vous pourriez aller voir Chapelain, l'exécuteur testamentaire de Denz, et lui parler du testament. Ou mieux encore, trouver qui est ce Fidélio et lui expliquer la situation ! Après tout, qui pourrait accepter un héritage qui ne lui revient pas de plein droit ? Franchement, c'est plus un inconvénient qu'autre chose. Et si vous avez besoin de quoi que ce soit, n'hésitez pas à faire appel à moi. Je suis une vraie mine d'informations, aussi bien sur Castel que sur d'autres sujets, et je peux vous recommander des gars si nécessaire... Je pourrais vous être utile ! »
languages.original_text: "You're a distinguished sort, you can muscle in on this. You can talk to Chaplain — he's Denz's executor — and ask about the will. Or maybe you can find Fidelio and have a talk with them too? I mean, who'd want an inheritance that's not rightfully theirs? More trouble than it's worth, if you ask me. And trust me, old Daggen can be of service to you if you need anything. I know lots about Footfall and other things, I can help with information, get you some solid lads for a job... You can use a guy like me!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes du genre distingué, alors vous pouvez sûrement mettre votre grain de sel. Vous pourriez aller voir Chapelain, l'exécuteur testamentaire de Denz, et lui parler du testament. Ou mieux encore, trouver qui est ce Fidélio et lui expliquer la situation ! Après tout, qui pourrait accepter un héritage qui ne lui revient pas de plein droit ? Franchement, c'est plus un inconvénient qu'autre chose. Et si vous avez besoin de quoi que ce soit, n'hésitez pas à faire appel à moi. Je suis une vraie mine d'informations, aussi bien sur Castel que sur d'autres sujets, et je peux vous recommander des gars si nécessaire... Je pourrais vous être utile ! »

languages.text: "Siz saygın birisiniz, bu duruma el atabilirsiniz. Papaz'la konuşmayı deneyin. Denz'in vasiyetinin yerine getirilmesinden o sorumlu. Ona vasiyeti sorun. Belki Fidelio'yu bulup onunla da konuşabilirsiniz. Kim hak etmediği bir vasiyeti sahiplenmek ister ki? Sefadan çok cefa çektirir bence. Bendeniz Daggen da sizlere her konuda yardımcı olabilirim. Binliman'ı, diğer işleri iyi bilirim. Bilgi edinmenize yardım ederim, bir mesele varsa güvenilir adam ayarlarım... İşinize yararım yani!"
languages.original_text: "You're a distinguished sort, you can muscle in on this. You can talk to Chaplain — he's Denz's executor — and ask about the will. Or maybe you can find Fidelio and have a talk with them too? I mean, who'd want an inheritance that's not rightfully theirs? More trouble than it's worth, if you ask me. And trust me, old Daggen can be of service to you if you need anything. I know lots about Footfall and other things, I can help with information, get you some solid lads for a job... You can use a guy like me!"

traits.locale_text: "Siz saygın birisiniz, bu duruma el atabilirsiniz. Denz'in vasiyet infazcısı Papaz'la konuşmayı deneyin, ona vasiyeti sorun. Belki Fidelio'yu bulup onunla da konuşabilirsiniz. Kim hak etmediği bir vasiyeti sahiplenmek ister ki? Vefasından çok cefası var bence. Bendeniz Daggen da sizlere her konuda yardımcı olabilirim. Binliman'ı ve birkaç başka işi iyi bilirim, bilgi edinmenize yardım ederim, güvenilir adam ayarlarım... İşinize yararım yani!"
